ovdesc.p: This application will hold the value of Customer segment, no of visits made by the Customer to the Branch, Date of last visit, Currency of the Customer, total Assets & Liabilites of Customer & Available limit of the Customer. Currently the Assets and Liabilities values in this screen are static fixed values, and are for representation purpose only.

desc.p: This field will identifies the value of number of visits made by the Customer to Branch .
Identifies the total values of Liability that the customer has.
It defines the segment type of the Customer. User can input the type of segment which the Customer belongs to. Ex:Normal, Preferred etc.
Identifies the total values of Assets that the customer has.
This field defines the value of available limit for a Customer.
Identifies the Currency of the Customer
3 type SSS (uppercase alpha) character or 1-3 numeric character Currency code. Cannot be changed after record has been authorised. (Mandatory Input)
It must be an existing code on the CURRENCY Table.
Date in which Customer has made the last visit to the Branch.
Validation rules : Valid T24 date format
